name: Grandma's Lemon Pound Cake
author: JenniferM
summary: This is my favorite cake recipe--my grandmother made it all the time. It is a great lemon pound cake that's not too sweet.
directions: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Sift flour and salt together into a bowl
Mix milk and lemon extract together in a separate bowl
Combine sugar, butter, and shortening in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy
Add eggs one at a time, beating until well combined
Mix in the flour mixture alternately with the milk mixture, beginning and ending with flour
Spread batter in the prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 2 hours
Do not open the oven door while the cake is baking
Cool briefly in the pan before inverting onto a wire rack to cool completely
